title: Seattle types?
content:
Is there any Typers from from Seattle out there. I ask as I would like to find someone  
to speak at the Seattle Graphic Designers Group (a Meetup.com gig). I had Thomas  
Phinney attend once which was very informative, so I am looking for fresh talent/  
or enthusiast.  
 [http://graphicdesign.meetup.com/151/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906233047/http:/graphicdesign.meetup.com/151/ "http://graphicdesign.meetup.com/151/")

 [‹ Favorite Moments of TypeCon2005 -- Post your photo links!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906233047/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14140 "Go to previous forum topic") [type + interior design ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906233047/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14943 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alchion

comments.content:
I’ll do it. I have more enthusiasm than talent though. I’ll check the link.

Is your group involved with next year’s Seattle Icograda conference?

[http://www.aiga.org/content.cfm/xcdprograms](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906233047/http:/www.aiga.org/content.cfm/xcdprograms "http://www.aiga.org/content.cfm/xcdprograms")

I was planning on volunteering but can’t find the info now.

Si

Cheers, Si (98118)
Well Simon, if you are from seattle and interested we should properly hook up or at least talk on the phone. my contact info is available at my site alchion.com

I’ll give you a call next week - off to the pub now as it’s POETS day today.

Si
